title: Across the Bridge (restored, colorized) (1957, thriller, imdb score: 7.2)

sources.title: Across The Bridge 1957 Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Across the Bridge is a 1957 British thriller film directed by Ken Annakin and starring Rod Steiger and Bernard Lee. It is based on the 1938 short story "Across the Bridge" by Graham Greene. According to his obituary, it was director Annakin's favourite film.
